#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<vector>
#include<map>
#include<queue>
#include<string>
#include<set>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<climits>
#include<cmath>
#include<utility>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;

ll num[1000000], denum[1000000];

int main(){
    int t, n, i;
    ll m;
    for( scanf("%d", &t); t; t-- ){
        scanf("%d%lld", &n, &m);
        num[0] = denum[0] = 1;
        for( i=1; i<n; i++){
            num[i] = (num[i-1] + denum[i-1])%m;
            denum[i] = (num[i-1] + (2*denum[i-1])%m )%m;
        }
        printf("%lld/%lld\n", num[n-1], denum[n-1]);
    }
    return 0;
}
